mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.renshidiaopei_name as renshidiaopeiName ,a.renshidiaopei_content as renshidiaopeiContent ,a.diaopei_time as diaopeiTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number as yuangongUuidNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.zhiwei as zhiwei ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail
FROM renshidiaopei a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.renshidiaopei_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshidiaopeiName},'%')
and a.renshidiaopei_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshidiaopeiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.diaopei_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.diaopeiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.diaopei_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.diaopeiTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.bumen_id = #{params.bumenId}
and yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongUuidNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.zhiwei like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhiwei},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
